about_the_game:
Installment and update
To install and run the DLC smoothly, players need to purchase the official version of The Vigilant Villa in the first place, which includes all contents from [ Chapter 1 to 8 ]as well as the [Tracing back Plots] part. As you’re playing, don’t forget to check the network connection of your device.

The Vigilant Villa: Mirror Nor Bright - Extra story lines of Clare Ye, Amy,John Zang, Jacky Jia
Life is such a beautiful bubble when one has braw dreams-
Sweet families, untarnished childhood wishes, immense amount of treasure...
Misled by lust and jealousy, these dreams would become something vile.
If so, all endeavors they invested become a futility.
After this, someone thinks, someone repents, someone doubts. Someone still struggles.
But the thing is, they can never buy their purest heart back.
